# Dotnet 8 Docs

## What's new

- [Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/whats-new/dotnet-8/overview.md): Learn about the new .NET features introduced in .NET 8.
- [Runtime](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/whats-new/dotnet-8/runtime.md): Learn about the new .NET features introduced in the .NET 8 runtime.
- [SDK and tooling](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/whats-new/dotnet-8/sdk.md): Learn about the new .NET SDK and tooling features introduced in .NET 8.
- [Containers](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/whats-new/dotnet-8/containers.md): Learn about the new containers features introduced in .NET 8.
